reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: ISN/ECC EXBS Task Order 15.004. APPROVAL FLOW EDIT: ISN Budget DELETED by Ariba Admin - Claudia E. Gutierrez on Tue Jul 28 05:01:08 EDT 2015 Reason Deleted: INC0120129 APPROVAL FLOW EDIT: Andrew Church DELETED by Ariba Admin - Claudia E. Gutierrez on Tue Jul 28 05:01:00 EDT 2015. ATA 11069 TCD EXTERNAL EVALUATIONS TAC TECHNOLOGIE. RPM WEST AFRICA REGIONAL. ATA 11478 CBRN OPS TCD PILOT 1. SURCHARGE FOR PR5567237. GATA OY2 Trinidad and Tobago DECO. Other Services - Contract Advisory and Assistance Service Management and Professional Support Services. OMS Regional West Africa Support Services. GATA Dominican Republic DECO OY2

description.narrative: Combat transnational terrorism, especially from al-Qa'ida, its affiliates, and adherents using a strategic counterterrorism approach that focuses on 1) countering violent extremism; 2) building the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutions to address threats within their own borders; and 3) building stronger relationships with our partners around the world – in order to engage in a broader, more comprehensive counterterrorism effort that treats civilian institutions, to include the justice sector and law enforcement, as a critical part of building effective partner capacity to counter terrorism.

This award strives to combat transnational terrorism, counter violent extremism, build the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutuions, and build stronger relationships with our partners around the world. This includes NON-PROLIFERATION Gregory Moore, (202) 647 4724[Management and professional support services generally aim at improving the efficiency or effectiveness of management or administrative systems and normally take the form of information, opinion, advice, training or direct assistance. Contracts may be with firms or individuals.]. Management and professional support services generally aim at improving the efficiency or effectiveness of management or administrative systems and normally take the form of information, opinion, advice, training or direct assistance. Contracts may be with firms or individuals.. Gregory Moore, (202) 647 4724[Management and professional support services generally aim at improving the efficiency or effectiveness of management or administrative systems and normally take the form of information, opinion, advice, training or direct assistance. Contracts may be with firms or individuals.]. NON-PROLIFERATION[Management and professional support services generally aim at improving the efficiency or effectiveness of management or administrative systems and normally take the form of information, opinion, advice, training or direct assistance. Contracts may be with firms or individuals.]. Information Redacted [Covers management and professional support services generally aim at improving the efficiency or effectiveness of management or administrative systems and normally take the form of information, opinion, advice, training or direct assistance. Contracts may be with firms or individuals.].
